mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (id, account, password, real_name, position, email, age, is_true, telephone, img, is_delete, create_time, update_time, version) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isTrue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update sys_user

mapper.select:
select
from sys_user where account=#{account} AND PASSWORD=#{pwd} ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1

from sys_user where account = #{account} ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1
